snippet: Several local governments in the western region of Xinjiang have ordered Muslim restaurants to stay open during the holy month of Ramadan and are telling civil servants and students to continue to eat and drink during daylight hours.
abstract: Several local governments in the Xinjiang region of China have ordered Muslim restaurants to stay open during the holy month of Ramadan; are also telling civil servants and students to continue to eat and drink during daylight hours, when Muslims generally fast.
lead_paragraph: Several local governments in the western region of Xinjiang have ordered Muslim restaurants to stay open during the holy month of Ramadan and are telling civil servants and students to continue to eat and drink during daylight hours.
